name: insularity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of only being interested in your own country or group and not being willing to accept different or foreign ideas: Their actions have led to accusations of insularity or arrogance. She dislikes the cosy insularity of the local jazz scene. See
insular
More examplesFewer examplesTheir struggle with a foreign language is the common legacy of stubborn insularity.The last decade has seen the emergence of strident insularity and greed across wealthy nations.The novel warns against the perils of cultural insularity.
